contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 26, 1946 D Tanunda Band Contest (B Grade)
Tanunda Band Contest (B Grade) 1 Set Test and Own Choice Tanunda Band Contest tanunda-band-contest-b-grade
Tanunda Recreation Grounds, Tanunda, South Australia, Australia Percy Jones was the appointed adjudicator but took sick just prior to the commencement of the contest and taken to hospital, Dave Hopkins. filled the breach
Contest consisted off own choice Overture (points listed under Test ) Own choice Hymn & Waltz (points combined & listed under Own Choice)
May 26, 2020, 12:15 a.m. May 27, 2020, 9:22 a.m.
1 Henley & Grange Municipal Clair Bail
2 Tanunda Town Band Arthur John
3 Prospect City (Sth Aust) Bert Harding
4 Kensington & Norwood Municipal (Sth Aust) Otto Lovell
5 Port Adelaide Municipal Unknown
Withdrawn Whyalla Citizens' Band Unknown
